ProjectTitle: IMPACT: Integrated Methodology for Performance Assessment and Characterisation of Thermal efficiency of buildings
InitialFeedbackHistory:
12/12/2024
From your DMP it is difficult to know whether you will process personal data or not, under personal data you answer no, but under sharing you do mention privacy as factor. Please make sure to address this with your ethics application so the ethics committee can advice whether this is personal data and registration is needed (which is part of the ethics file) or not. After approval please update your DMP if needed and submit as intermediate. You can find more information here: https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/studpers/index or contact pret@kuleuven.be if you have further questions.
Preservation: Long term storage on the J drive is relatively expensive, the K drive specifically designed for archiving is a more budget-friendly solution. For an overview of all solutions see: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
label: intermediate DMP needed
